column1: Kata Robata////I am not sure why some yelpers compared this place to Uchi. I would like to apologize to Uchi for leaving my $150 at Kata Robata. The service was a solid 3 for their menu prices. One dish was ok (Portuguese octopus)
column3: and their lobster tempura was simply horrible. The wine list by glass was pretty grim. We also found a hair on our tuna sashimi. Sashimi was properly exchanged but never-ever-ever a sushi hair would happen at Uchi. Anyway
column4: it is an ok place to try once. Not a good place to become a regular customer though.
